name: Keep it Natural
description: Keep it Natural is a game where you are ... a yogurt, but a very strong one ! In that game, you are fighting the upcoming sugar who's trying to invade your table. You are able to push it away, or slam the table to make it fly away. All the sugar you pushed out of the table is put in a scale, so try to male the best weight possible ! That game was developed for My First Game Jam, with the optional theme : "Nature".
